overview: On her deathbed, a mother makes her son promise never to get married, which scars him with psychological blocks to a commitment with his girlfriend. They finally decide to tie the knot in Vegas, but a wealthy gambler arranges for the man to lose $65K in a poker game and offers to clear the debt for a weekend with his fianc√©e.
tagline: A comedy about one bride, two grooms, and a wedding party you won't believe.
title: Honeymoon in Vegas
